tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: \"I recently had the pleasure of visiting Mr. Moxit at his dental practice, and I must say, I was thoroughly impressed with the care and attention he provided. Not only was he incredibly friendly and welcoming, but he also took the time to explain my dental health issue in a clear and concise manner, making sure I understood everything before proceeding with the treatment.\n\nHis professionalism and expertise put me at ease, and I left the practice feeling confident that my dental health was in good hands. I highly recommend Mr. Moxit to anyone in need of dental services, and I look forward to visiting his practice again in the future.\

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: He is very friendly and caring person. He is keeping my records more than 10 years old. He briefly explained my problem and solution for that. Thank you Dr. Moxit.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Moxith is a nice doctor with good knowledge of teeth implantation and I got 4 teeth’s implantation done in his clinic. It’s been one year now. I am really happy to say that, I am having no problems and he suggested few things and we need to follow diligently.  I recommend this doctor even for tooth filling . As even my tooth filling experience is also very good.  He explains very well. Ask questions he will not get irritated but he explains patiently. Thank you doctor.

review: Dr.Moxit is very friendly and professional he explained in detail about my dental issue, I got my tooth extracted and i am highly satisfied with my treatment, The clinic is well maintained and hygienic with friendly staff, I Highly recommend this doctor for all dental related issues.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Most caring about the real problem of the patient.Before uprooting teeth he takes all medical precaution viz.BP,drug allergy,anyother past deseases and its root,queries about curing the deseases and so on.Not in favour of unnecessary application of medicine.Any post operative instruction to patient is very simple.Moreover his behaviour is very charming.Always smiling and gently behaved.
